A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible. Trashed established Star Wars canon. Flat characters stumbling about. One character's heroic moment stolen (people in the audience actually said wtf). Luke was complely ruined\, it was unbelievable. It seemed to be made by someone that never saw or read anything about Star Wars. I have lost hope for the 3rd movie release\, even though I have been to every Star Wars in theaters since 1977. Sad.
